mapper.sql: tb.legal_id as legalId, tb.member_id as memberId, tb.used_price as usedPrice, tb.locked_price as lockedPrice, tb.type as type, tb.version as version, tb.status as status, tb.del as del, tb.remark as remark, tb.CREATE_TIME as createTime, tb.CREATE_USER as createUser, tb.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, tb.UPDATE_USER as updateUser
mapper.select:
select
from fin_legal tb inner join app_member am on tb.member_id = am.member_id where tb.del='N'
and tb.member_id =(select member_id from app_member where account=#{condition})
and (am.member_id = #{memberId} or am.parent_referee_id like concat('%',#{recommendIds}))
and tb.used_price >= #{minPrice}
and tb.used_price <= #{maxPrice}
order by tb.update_time desc
